text:
Low Pressure has brought some pretty decent rainfall totals over the past 24 hours, with many parts of the UK (mainly higher ground) seeing over 25mm (see graphic). 

Highest totals (06-06Z) at Middle Fell Farm in the Lake District - 101.6mm and counting @EnvAgency https://t.co/z0AGsAeD9M

@HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Even if they are below , which is highly debatable mr Bowen , it doesn‚Äôt escape the facts that in March over one weekend they were WELL OVER the WHO health limits on those days . It also doesn‚Äôt hide the fact that your site emits hydrogen sulfide into the air .

urls.title: Walleys Quarry ‚Äì Staffordshire Landfill
urls.description: Walleys Quarry offers customers a safe disposal method for waste that cannot be otherwise re-used or recycled. Our team of experts carefully manage and monitor the site through a set of tight controls and procedures to the highest standards and ensure compliance with all legal and governmental policies and regulations. We work to minimise any impact on the environment now and for the future of the site. The Walleys Quarry community fund has distributed over ¬£1.7m to community and environmental projects
